paper_abstract: Purpose - To find an easy and accurate method for evaluating the Pollaczek's integral in earth-retum path impedance calculation. Design/methodology/approach - The Monte Carlo method of evaluating the Pollaczek's integral is introduced. Findings - The Monte Carlo method is easy and accurate method for this computation. Research limitations/implications; - Using proposed method in cases of earth stratification. Practical implications - The proposed method can be used in power system transient software. Originality/value - The proposed method introduces a computation method for calculation of Pollaczek's integral which is valuable for power engineers.
paper_title: Monte Carlo method application to evaluate the infinite integrals of underground cable earth-return path impedance
